thread.title: Nicola McLean's husband says she spent the day with a psychiatrist in unaired Celebrity Big Brother scenes
thread.title_full: Nicola McLean's husband says she spent the day with a psychiatrist in unaired Celebrity Big Brother scenes

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Nicola McLean's husband says she spent the day with a psychiatrist in unaired Celebrity Big Brother scenes
text:
TV Nicola McLean's husband says she spent the day with a psychiatrist in unaired Celebrity Big Brother scenes The star's man Tom Williams has broken his silence and tweeted that it wasn't shown on Tuesday night's broadcast Share Nicola McLean in CBB (Photo: Copyright unknown) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Nicola McLean's husband has claimed she spent "all day" with a psychiatrist - but it wasn't shown on Celebrity Big Brother . 
The star - who was blasted by viewers and Loose Women panelists for her flirting with Jamie O'Hara - has been defended by her man Tom Williams, who made the claim on Tuesday night. 
The footballer - who has sons Rocky and Striker with his wife - tweeted: "Interesting that @bbuk didn't show that Nicola has been with a psychiatrist all day @rylan @EmmaWillis (sic)" Tom Williams tweet (Photo: Twitter/MrTomWilliams) Tom Williams and Nicola McLean (Photo: FameFlynet) 
It comes after Nicola raised eyebrows after seemingly flirting with Danielle Lloydâ€™s ex-husband during a drunken night in the Channel 5 house and suggested they may have kissed in the past. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
